records.text: I think I understand now why I'm a little unsettled when I see players performing the sign of the cross during a sports match. This is not about religion, it's about our behavior in a context that has additional meaning beyond the common regard of it...and it makes me sad.

You then put the thumb turn over the screw holes - genius! Smarthome
